metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1247 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue found in linux-kernel that leads to a race condition in rose_connect(). The rose driver uses rose_neigh->use to represent how many objects are using the rose_neigh. When a user wants to delete a rose_route via rose_ioctl(), the rose driver calls rose_del_node() and removes neighbours only if their “count” and “use” are zero.

notes.Note: sbeattie> mitigation is to disable and prevent af_rose from being autoloaded, I suspect. unfixed upstream as of 2023.01.10
